short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Annoying Pop-up When You Click the Icon

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes Pop-Ups from News Sites telling you to subscribe, Social Media sites telling you to log in, and any other annoying popup that fills the web page and blocks scrolling.
